survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Plant-Based Food Products Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences, purchasing behaviors, and attitudes toward plant-based food products to help businesses tailor their offerings effectively.

questions.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based food products?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This question sets the baseline for dietary habits.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you consume plant-based food products?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for consuming plant-based food products? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything other than 'Rarely or never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes are appropriate here. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). If 'Other' is selected, trigger a follow-up open-text field.
